Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:25% Killing=3.125 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:30% Killing=200 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC50=>200µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans DMST 41283(MIC50=>200µg/ml),Salmonella sp.(MIC=>256µM),Mycobacterium abscessus ATCC 19977(MIC=>400µg/ml)
